api_token.description: Jira API Token. See the docs for more information on how to generate this key.

domain.description: Domain for your Jira account, e.g. airbyteio.atlassian.net

email.description: The user email for your Jira account

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Comma-separated list of Jira project keys to replicate data for

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date from which you'd like to replicate data for Jira in the format YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z. All data generated after this date will be replicated. Note that it will be used only in the following incremental streams: issues.

additional_fields.title: Additional Fields
additional_fields.description: Comma-separated list of additional fields to include in replicating issues

expand_issue_changelog.title: Expand Issue Changelog
expand_issue_changelog.description: Expand the changelog when replicating issues

render_fields.title: Render Issue Fields
render_fields.description: Render issue fields in HTML format in addition to Jira's JSON-like format
